9.4 DUIM-Frames Module

*progress-note*

Fluid variable

Summary

Specifies a default progress note that can be used.

Type

<object>

Initial value

#f

Library

duim-frames

Module

duim-frames

Description

This variable is used to supply a default progress note to use if no progress note is explicitly specified.

See also

note-progress, page 836

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
